title: Daily affirmations & weekly gratitude digest with Notion, Email & Telegram
description:
üå∏ **Affirmation Sender + Weekly Gratitude Digest v2**  
### *A gentle, automated wellness ritual for high-impact women who scale with grace.*

üìå **What it does**  
- **Every morning at 7 a.m.** (your timezone) ‚Üí a *fresh* affirmation lands in **Email, Telegram, or both**.  
- **Every Sunday at 6 p.m.** ‚Üí a *beautiful recap* of your last-7-day gratitude notes is delivered.  
- **Logs everything** to a simple Notion hub so you can revisit, review, or share.

‚ú® **Out-of-the-box experience**  
| Channel | Morning Affirmation | Sunday Digest |
|---------|---------------------|---------------|
| **Email** | Styled HTML + tasteful Unsplash hero image | Scroll-ready digest with blush-gold imagery |
| **Telegram** | Minimal text + emoji sparkle | Same digest, perfectly mobile-formatted |

üõ†Ô∏è **30-second setup**  
1. **Fork the template** in n8n.  
2. **Fill four fields** in `Set: User Config` (email, Telegram chat ID, Notion DB ID, channel).  
3. **Connect credentials** (Email SMTP, Telegram Bot, Notion, *optional* Slack/Discord).  
4. **Activate** ‚Äî your future self will thank you.

üß© **Notion schema you‚Äôll create** (copy-paste once)
| Property | Type | Example |
|----------|------|---------|
| **Name** | Title | ‚ÄúI choose grace and ease today.‚Äù |
| **Type** | Select | `Affirmation` or `Gratitude` |
| **Date** | Date | 2025-08-19 |
| **Channel** | Multi-select | `email`, `telegram` |
| **Message** | Rich text | Full text or note |

üÜï **v2 upgrades**  
- **Timezone-aware** ‚Äì respects the workflow‚Äôs TZ setting.  
- **Filtered queries** ‚Äì digest only fetches `Type = Gratitude` from the last 7 days (faster, lighter).  
- **Rich media** ‚Äì every email includes an Unsplash banner (keywords you choose, **no API key**).  
- **Observability** ‚Äì global error handler pings Slack or Discord within **5 seconds** if anything breaks.  

‚úÖ **No hidden data, no secrets**  
- Zero hard-coded keys.  
- Test with a sandbox Notion DB first.  
- Ready for **solo founders, coaches, or community managers** who want to gift their members a daily dose of calm.

üöÄ **One-click install**  
Clone ‚Üí configure ‚Üí activate.  
**Your gentlest growth system is now on autopilot.**
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
